name: My Little Hayden Farm
description:
A game about raising your own little Hayden to call your own.

Hayden roams around the farm all day honking when he wants, feeding him will make his honk rate go up!

Controls:

- Interact.

- Menu.

- Menu hotkeys.

- Close game.

HAYDEN FARM CHANGELOG:

>0.04c - April/ 9 /2018 - 3,217 Kb
+Added food place sound.
+Edited some of the sounds and then got bored.
+Implemented 'ping-pong' code for eating animation.
-Removed or compressed sprites.
+Compressed audio on load resulting in much lower games size
+Added red flash upon hurting Hayden.
+Re-did coins 3 times giving suffix 'c' to version.
+Used profiler for first time, I now live by it.
+Checked over all code and have concluded it to be horrendous.
+Actual optimizations, seriously, play 0.03 once.
-No longer place eggs outside of fence.
-Temporarily keeping Hayden from escaping for another 2 years.
+Added to Hayden AI to combat fence clingers.
+Changed particles to use hex codes.
+Added my Bandcamp to splash screen.
*Please buy my album.
+Student debt.
-Removed Android support.
+Now display 'A,D,S,F' hotkeys over corrisponding buttons.
+Almost everything has been tweaked, it's been two years, how am I supposed
to remember everything I've done? Look at the file size and get 13,000 coins
on screen, this is just an optimization update. :(
>0.03 - April/ 9 /2016 - 13,164 Kb
+Redone UI.
+Added Options.
+Added Map.
+Added load/save.
+Changed food.
*Fixed food bug which blocked honk speed.
+Slop Shop.
+Inventory.
+Changed textures slightly.
+Click Hayden.
+Name Hayden in menu.
+Few new animations.
+Few new sounds.
+Mute button.
+Major optimizations.
-Removed 2008.
+Splash screen with game version display.
+Pro license.
+New icon.
+Food spoils.
+Can't hatch egg outside farm.
+Initial honk speed varies on hatch.
+Cheat code.
+ASDF hotkeys.
+Android support.
>0.02 - June/ 25 /2015 - 12.888 Kb
+Added shop.
+Added currency.
+Changed textures slightly.
+Moved fencing.
>0.01 - June/ 18 /2015 - 12,660 Kb
+First version.

Planned:

  • Stats menu.
  • Combat.
  • Cosmetics (Smile Guy glasses).
  • More Hayden variants.
  • More complex AI.
  • More locations.
  • Plants.
  • End game.

*TIPS*

  • Clicking Hayden while the menu is open allows you to name him.
  • Scrolling/Arrow keys will change text color while naming.
  • Placing eggs outside of the fence is not allowed for now.
  • WASD will move the camera, R will reset it.
  • Poking Hayden will not hurt him...yet.
  • Do you trust Gluttonous Slob?
  • There's a cheat code.
  • ndont
